additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Cloudy Pear Juice (51%), Reconstituted Apple Juice and Apple Puree (31.9%), Mango Puree (12%), Banana Puree (3%), Passionfruit Juice (2%), Acidity Regulator (330), Vitamin C (300).

description: Boost Mango Sunshine Juice is a tasty blend of pear, apple, mango, banana, and passionfruit, perfect as a refreshing drink to go with your meals or for during an afternoon break. It has the tastiest infusions, deliciously thirst-quenching for everyone to enjoy.Made in Australia
name: Mango Sunshine Juice Chilled
